Class Coordinate

java.lang.Object
org.jscience.geography.Coordinate
public class Coordinate extends Object
Represents a geographic coordinate (latitude/longitude) using proper unit-safe quantities.

Uses WGS84 datum by default. This class provides a simpler API for social/human geography applications while internally using proper

Since:
1.0
Author:
Silvere Martin-Michiellot, Gemini AI (Google DeepMind)

    Coordinate(double latitudeDegrees, double longitudeDegrees)

    Creates a coordinate from latitude and longitude quantities.

    Creates a coordinate from latitude, longitude, and altitude quantities.

    • distanceTo

      public Quantity<Length> distanceTo(Coordinate other)
      Calculates distance to another coordinate using Haversine formula.
      Parameters:
      other - target coordinate
      Returns:
      distance as a Length quantity

    • bearingTo

      public Quantity<Angle> bearingTo(Coordinate other)
      Calculates bearing to another coordinate.
      Returns:
      bearing as an Angle quantity (0-360 degrees)

    • toDMS

      public String toDMS()
      Returns coordinate in DMS (degrees, minutes, seconds) format.
